mapper.select: SELECT B.COLUMN_NAME FROM USER_CONSTRAINTS A , USER_CONS_COLUMNS B WHERE A.OWNER = #{owner} AND A.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND A.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'P' AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND A.CONSTRAINT_NAME = B.CONSTRAINT_NAME
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} SET CRT_UID = #{crtUid}, CRT_IP = #{crtIp}, CRT_DS = SYSDATE, UDT_UID = #{udtUid}, UDT_IP = #{udtIp}, UDT_DS = SYSDATE WHERE ${conditionClause}
